lines.name: The Balance of Terror

explicitModifiers.text: +(10-15)% to all Elemental Resistances
Action Speed cannot be Slowed below Base Value if you've cast Temporal Chains in the past 10 seconds
Action Speed cannot be modified to below Base Value if you've cast Temporal Chains in the past 10 seconds
(6-10)% chance to deal Double Damage if you've cast Vulnerability in the past 10 seconds
(20-25)% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate if you've cast Temporal Chains in the past 10 seconds
Immune to Curses if you've cast Despair in the past 10 seconds
Inflict Lightning Exposure on Hit if you've cast Conductivity in the past 10 seconds
Immune to Reflected Damage if you've cast Punishment in the past 10 seconds
Inflict Withered for 2 seconds on Hit if you've cast Despair in the past 10 seconds
Gain (30-40)% of Physical Damage as a Random Element if you've cast Elemental Weakness in the past 10 seconds
Inflict Fire Exposure on Hit if you've cast Flammability in the past 10 seconds
You are Unaffected by Ignite if you've cast Flammability in the past 10 seconds
You are Unaffected by Shock if you've cast Conductivity in the past 10 seconds
You are Unaffected by Bleeding if you've cast Vulnerability in the past 10 seconds
Intimidate Enemies on Hit if you've cast Punishment in the past 10 seconds
Cold Exposure on Hit if you've cast Frostbite in the past 10 seconds
Take no Extra Damage from Critical Strikes if you've cast Enfeeble in the past 10 seconds
You are Unaffected by Freeze if you've cast Frostbite in the past 10 seconds
+(30-40)% to Critical Strike Multiplier if you've cast Enfeeble in the past 10 seconds
Immune to Exposure if you've cast Elemental Weakness in the past 10 seconds

lines.flavourText:
Fellshrine stood as a holy bastion opposite the
Chamber of Sins, and all that it represented.
For one to rise, the other must fall.

lines.name: Fluid Motion

implicitModifiers.text: (10-15)% reduced Effect of Chill on you
1% of Damage taken Recouped as Mana
15% reduced Effect of Shock on you
20% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech
5% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills

explicitModifiers.text: +(16-24) to Dexterity
Strength from Passives in Radius is Transformed to Dexterity

lines.flavourText: Even the strongest of steel can be made to bend.

lines.name: Elegant Hubris

implicitModifiers.text: 1% of Damage taken gained as Mana over 4 seconds when Hit
20% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech
20% increased total Recovery per second from Mana Leech
1% of Damage taken Recouped as Mana
(3-6)% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills
20% increased Recovery per second from Life Leech
(10-15)% reduced Effect of Shock on you
(10-15)% reduced Effect of Chill on you

explicitModifiers.text:
Commissioned (2020-159980) coins to commemorate Chitus
Passives in radius are Conquered by the Eternal Empire

Commissioned (2000-160000) coins to commemorate Victario
Passives in radius are Conquered by the Eternal Empire

Commissioned (2000-159980) coins to commemorate Caspiro
Passives in radius are Conquered by the Eternal Empire

Commissioned (2020-160000) coins to commemorate Cadiro
Passives in radius are Conquered by the Eternal Empire
Historic

lines.flavourText: They believed themselves better than the past, but that confidence brought about nightmare.

lines.name: Seething Fury

implicitModifiers.text: 15% reduced Effect of Shock on you
15% reduced Effect of Chill on you
20% increased total Recovery per second from Mana Leech
20% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech
1% of Damage taken Recouped as Mana

explicitModifiers.text: (10-15)% increased Attack Damage while holding a Shield
+(0.04-0.2)% to Off Hand Critical Strike Chance per 10 Maximum Energy Shield on Shield
+(1-4)% to Off Hand Critical Strike Multiplier per 10 Maximum Energy Shield on Shield

lines.flavourText:
The enslaved Ezomyte clans were not permitted to own weapons.
For years, they trained in secret, watching and waiting for the
perfect moment to reveal the true depth of the Empire's folly.

lines.name: Ring of Blades

implicitModifiers.text: 20% increased Recovery per second from Life Leech
20% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech
10% reduced Effect of Shock on you
3% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills
15% reduced Effect of Chill on you
20% increased total Recovery per second from Mana Leech

explicitModifiers.text: (10-15)% increased Global Physical Damage
With at least 40 Dexterity in Radius, Ethereal Knives fires (5-10) additional Projectiles
With at least 40 Dexterity in Radius, Ethereal Knives fires Projectiles in a circle

lines.flavourText:
At night, as a young Daresso shared his bed with a woman whose name he could not recall,
his thoughts remained in the one place he called his own: The Grand Arena.

lines.name: Collateral Damage

explicitModifiers.text: (10-15)% increased Global Physical Damage
With at least 40 Dexterity in Radius, Galvanic Arrow has 25% increased Area of Effect
With at least 40 Dexterity in Radius, Galvanic Arrow deals 50% increased Area Damage

lines.flavourText:
Malachai ran roughshod over every ethical boundary in pursuit of creating the ideal gemling.
For him, there was no doubt that the end would justify the means.

lines.name: Careful Planning

implicitModifiers.text: 20% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech
1% of Damage taken Recouped as Mana
(5-6)% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills

explicitModifiers.text: +(16-24) to Dexterity
Intelligence from Passives in Radius is Transformed to Dexterity

lines.flavourText:
"Greatly outnumbered, Deshret dressed her personal guard 
in identical garb. When the Empire rode north, Deshret and 
her guard took turns revealing themselves, creating the illusion 
of speed beyond the capabilities of even the Virtue Gems."
- History of the Maraketh

lines.name: Growing Agony

implicitModifiers.text: 10% reduced Effect of Chill on you
1% of Damage taken Recouped as Mana

explicitModifiers.text: (4-12)% increased Damage over Time
With at least 40 Dexterity in Radius, Viper Strike deals 2% increased Damage with Hits and Poison for each Poison on the Enemy
With at least 40 Dexterity in Radius, Viper Strike has a 10% chance per Poison on Enemy to grant Unholy Might for 4 seconds on Hit

lines.flavourText:
Maligaro understood that devotion to science,
Means devotion to trial and error.
For Maligaro's errors, death was slow,
And very painful.

lines.name: Unstable Payload

implicitModifiers.text: 20% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech
3% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills
1% of Damage taken Recouped as Mana

explicitModifiers.text: (8-12)% Chance for Traps to Trigger an additional time

lines.flavourText: Saboteurs, like chefs, have their own secret recipes.
